body_text:
Fixes #1005
Basically, the issue here is that there was no query component on the recipe form. Any values displayed in the select field were taken from whatever was already loaded in the store. This PR adds a PaginatedSelect base component which handles loading paginated data and inserting it into a Select field.

Adds PaginatedSelect abstract component

Given a list and query component, displays a show more... button in the list until all pages are loaded and displayed in the select


Adds ExtensionSelect, RecipeSelect components. Technically RecipeSelect is unnecessary, but I wanted to make sure the base component would work for both use cases.
Adds numPages and all properties to Recipes and Extension listing stores
Adds appropriate selectors


This PR requires tests, but the rest is up for feedback!

title: #1005: Fix XPI select field not populating correctly
body: Fixes #1005 Basically, the issue here is that there was no query component on the recipe form. Any values displayed in the select field were taken from whatever was already loaded in the store. This PR adds a `PaginatedSelect` base component which handles loading paginated data and inserting it into a `Select` field. - Adds `PaginatedSelect` abstract component - Given a list and query component, displays a `show more...` button in the list until all pages are loaded and displayed in the select - Adds `ExtensionSelect`, `RecipeSelect` components. Technically `RecipeSelect` is unnecessary, but I wanted to make sure the base component would work for both use cases. - Adds `numPages` and `all` properties to Recipes and Extension `listing` stores - Adds appropriate selectors This PR requires tests, but the rest is up for feedback!
